reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Review on this tablet
reviews.reviewText: I recently had the opportunity to explore a range of children's tablets for my grandson Kylin, who loves learning and having fun with technology.After some research, I found a tablet that perfectly fits the bill for kids like Kylin, who are curious and eager to explore the digital world.The tablet we selected not only offers a user-friendly interface but also provides a vast array of educational apps and games in both English and other languages like Spanish and German.This aligns perfectly with my passion for learning and language acquisition. Kylin has been able to pick up basic words in these languages while having a blast playing interactive games.One of the standout features is its durability. Being a child-friendly tablet, it can withstand the occasional drops and spills that are bound to happen. Plus, the parental control options give me peace of mind, knowing that Kylin is safe while navigating the online world.As someone who loves to travel, I appreciate that this tablet can serve as a great companion during long journeys.It keeps Kylin engaged with educational content and entertainment, making those trips more enjoyable for both of us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT BUY
reviews.reviewText: This product is HORRIBLE! Turns off on its own. Won’t hold a charge. Won’t connect to the internet but will connect to my phones hot spot. Trouble setting it up. Is SLOW! Don’t waste your time or money. Find a better alternative. Especially if you are purchasing for a small child. Kids have little to no patience as it is. This thing is slow. A SHEIN tablet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Six is great. Easy to function for kids .. connects to networks great.. no lagging.. big clear screen

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars OK, but poor battery life
reviews.reviewText: I purchased one of these in August for our 3 year old. Likely just luck of the draw, but we didn't experience any problems with wireless connectivity , screen or admin functionality that others have reported. The performance isn't top-level but adequate for a price-point tablet like this. At first the battery life was great - 5 hours or so. Since then, the battery life has slowly degraded to the point where it only has about 2 hours use time. The battery will no longer charge while the unit is up and running. We have to shut it down for the battery to even take a charge. I suspect that it may become unusable in the next 6 months or so. We'll see. I would advise buying the extra protection warranty if offered.UPDATE Feb 2024: Battery life is down to under 30 minutes now. Additionally, the unit absolutely will NOT connect to my phone's hot spot whereas my ancient Samsung Tab 3 has no problem doing so.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Tablet won't work
reviews.reviewText: It's a great tablet for kids but the battery seems to not want to charge anymore. Tried turning it on while hooked up to my computer to see if the charging cord or the tablet plug works, and it does send a signal but then an exclamation mark on a battery turns on and just doesn't charge I leave it for an 1hr nada nothing.I've only had it for a couple of months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean picture & transition
reviews.reviewText: This tablet is very nice, super kid friendly. It doesn’t lag & the transition between apps is flawless. My daughter loves it. It has a big screen & the case is great with a stand & easy buttons for her to control. It is a bit heavy for her but it’s mostly laying down or standing up. Great buy!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not a good item
reviews.reviewText: I have never given a review on an item, but this one I had too. I am totally disappointed in this product I got this tablet as a gift for my son's birthday. And while trying to setup the tablet the screen kept switching to the home screen and would not allow me to go into settings or neither would it let me select wifi. After trying for 15 minutes holding the screen with two fingers hoping I could select it quickly it still switched off I was successful with that method once, but the tablet still would not allow me too setup the screen frozen in settings then went back to the home screen. I will be returning I wanted to see if this was a defect in this tablet, but I read another review and she mention her second one did the same thing. I'm happy for those whose tablet worked. Because I loved the size and what it said it had to offer. If they see this message and send me a working device I would give it another try. This company needs to check all their devices if this keeps having, I have read several people having an issue. I'm sure the company is aware of their defective devices by now I'm just wondering if this is a scam. If I had a choice I would rate this tablet a zero.
